155232221121.content:
Alex was over her sofa reading her favorite fashion magazine while eating popcorns.
She was 16 years old, and despite having made peace with herself for the end of her story with Dean, it was a too fresh thing to hope she would have stopped to suffer for it already. Justin was happy with his Juliet, and she was happy for it, really, but she really envied their happiness.
She was wearing a purple shirt and a pair of tight white jeans.
“Max, come on, it’s time for today’s lesson.” Jerry called for her from the Waverly Sub-Station.
Sighing, since she was really not in the mood, Alex forced herself up and reached the Lair, where her father was waiting for her. Justin was already there, of course, and Max too.
“Alex, I know you’re still thinking to Dean, but I need you to concentrate on this magic lesson.” Jerry said once she arrived.
“Okay, I will.” she replied with her annoyed tone of voice, as she sat down next to Max.
Once the three kids were all ready for the lesson, Jerry turned the blackboard, and read what was written on it “Today’s lesson is about parallel realities.”
“There is more than one reality? But then what is real? Is there a reality where I’m a hot-dog?” Max said.
“In a reality such at that you would eat yourself.” Justin replied.
“Isn’t that great?” Max insisted.
Jerry decide to ignore the youngest son and continued to explain “There are many realities, each one unique in some way. For example, there could be a reality where I never fall in love with your mother, I’m still a wizard and all of you never existed.”
“Oh, please, something else!” Alex exclaimed. It was still fresh in the memories of all three Russo the adventure in Caribbean.
“I have a couple of questions.” Justin said, thinking to that adventure “Does different realities exist at the same time? Can a reality overwrite another?”
“Yes to the first question, no to the latter. A reality overwrites a pre-existing one only by a direct action. In natural circumstances realities are separated.” Jerry explained.
“Is there a way to move to a different reality?” Alex asked, while an idea began to pervade her devious mind.
“Yes, there is a spell just for that. You must say your name and the words In aliam rem movetur. This will transport you to a special place where you can choose a reality and warp in it. Be aware that this spell requires the use of your wand. If you move to another reality and lose your wand, you’ll be stuck there.”
“Why should someone transport in another reality? It’s ridiculous.” Justin said.
“Oh, you would be surprised of how many wizards did that.” his father replied “Normally they search for something that in their reality doesn’t exist anymore. For example, I would transport in a reality where the Asteroid Belt is still opened.”
He laughed at the last sentence, but none of the kids laughed with him, so he stopped.
“Maybe a reality where you, uncle Kelbo and aunt Megan are still friends?” Justin intervened.
Jerry sighed “I’d really liked that, it’s true.”
“Then why don’t you go?” Max stepped in, incredibly catching the sense of the dialogue.
“If I go a reality like that, the other me that is in that reality would vanish, and you three and your mother in this reality will lose me forever.” Jerry explained “I’d like to reconciliate with my sibling here than escape elsewhere and live a mockery of happiness.”
But Alex didn’t care about that last part. In her mind she was already depicting herself in a reality where she and Dean were a happy couple without problems in the world. Maybe a reality where she was the family wizard, and the laws of magical world were ok with wizards and mortals to get married. It would have been perfect. A reality where she was a full wizard married with Dean. Perfect.
Of even better, a reality where wizards rule the world and she could have Gigi as personal servants… okay, her fantasy was going wild. Better stop at the perfect union with Dean.
Once the lesson was over, Alex decided to hide in her room. There, she took her wand and pronounced the spell “Alex Russo in aliam rem movetur!”
A flash of light came from the wand, blinding her for some seconds. When she could open her eyes again, she was in strange place filled with darkness, like infinite open space. She was over a piece of rock similar to an asteroid, and an extraordinary number of bubbles were floating all around her.
“These are the different realities.” she thought “I must enter in one of these, I suppose. Which one?”
She casted a searching spell telling what she was looking for. One of the bubbles began to glow, and she knew it was the one containing the reality where she was with Dean.
Alex began to move toward it, with happiness pervading her heart. But while she was imagining herself in his embrace, she accidentally stumbled in her own feet, falling against another bubble.
Everything went black.
Once Alex regained consciousness, she found herself back in her living room, on her sofa.
“Ow, that was strange!” she exclaimed.
Alex looked around, asking herself “Where did I land?”
The main door suddenly opened. It was…
155232221121.title: Into the new reality

choices: Lowered her head and marched toward the nursery
1552322211211.content:
Theresa walked in, with a big shopping bag in her arms.
“Hi, Alex.” she said, while closing the door.
“Mom… is everything normal?” Alex asked, a bit disappointed. She knew she wasn’t in the reality she wanted to reach, but she was still curious about what type of reality she stepped in and was displeased to have landed in a reality so similar to her original one. At least it seemed very similar.
“Why shouldn’t it be, sweetheart?” said Theresa, putting the bag down and coming closer to her “Everything is just fine.”
“What a boring reality.” Alex whispered, takin her wand out again “Alex Russo in aliam…”
Before she could finish the spell, however, Theresa took her wand from her hand with a rapid movement, saying in a very firm scolding tone “Alexandra Margarita Russo, you know you’re not allowed to play with your brothers’ wands!”
Alex remained without words, while her mother looked closely at her wand.
“No, it’s not one of your brothers’ wand.” Theresa said “It’s a different one.”
She pointed a finger to her daughter face, scolding her again “If you have stolen this, you’re in an ocean of troubles young lady!”
“Mom! That’s my wand!” Alex exclaimed, astonished. Did she land in a reality where se was without magical powers?
“Alex, these things are too dangerous for you and you know it.” Theresa continued, putting the wand in one of her pockets. Then she looked closely at Alex, adding “And where is your diaper? You are allowed to play dress-up, but you have to keep it under your clothes. You know the rules.”
Alex was in complete shock at those words.
“What?! But Mom…!” she exclaimed.
“But mom this, but mom that. Knock it off, Alex!” Theresa scolded “You are already in trouble, do you want make your situation even worse?”
Alex stood there, opening and closing her mouth like a fish gasping for breath. This version of her mom had a willpower that the original didn’t possess.
“Now you’ll march you butt in the nursery, young lady. I can’t believe you removed your diaper.” Theresa commanded. As Alex stood up, the mother gave her a loud smack over the bottom, adding “Quick.”
Alex…
1552322211211.title: A new mom?

15523222112112.title: Lowered her head and marched toward the nursery

155232221121121.content:
Alex lowered her head and marched toward the nursery. She moved a foot after another, trembling a little, without diverting the stare from the floor. She was completely ashamed. Her mom gave her a spank and was taking her to a nursery to put a diaper on her. That was the most humiliating situation she has never found herself in. And since her mother took her wand, she couldn’t even use magic to escape.
While walking, Alex decided to ask Theresa, that was right behind her, what was that reality.
“Mom, I’m a little dizzy.” she begun to say, using her ability in deceit “Can you remember me the rules? I won’t break them again, I promise. But you should refresh my memory about them.”
Theresa sighed, replying “The ground rules are simple: every underage girl must always be in diapers. Toilets are off-limits till you reach 18th birthday. Taking your diaper off is a severe offence. Little girls must always obey their mommy and daddy. There are others rule, but you should focus on these.”
“And what about magic?” Alex asked, getting as an answer another loud smack over the bottom.
“I knew you were going there, young lady. You’ll have a talk with your father once you’re properly dressed.” Theresa said.
“Am I in trouble?” the girl asked, a little afraid.
“What do you think? You were without your diaper and were using magic without permission. You will be severely punished.” her mom confirmed.
“Great, just arrived and already grounded.” the young Russo thought.
The two arrived in front of a door completely absent in Alex’s original reality. Theresa opened it for her, and Alex saw that was indeed a nursery… but a giant-sized one. A changing table was in the middle of the room, big enough for her to comfortably lay on it, with a diaper pale next to it. Changing supplies were all around. And there was an open wardrobe full of packages. Alex looked at them: those were unmistakably packages of diapers.
A third loud smack landed on her bottom, as her mother commanded “Move in, young lady!”
Still too ashamed to do anything, Alex entered in the nursery.
Theresa took her by a hand and guided her toward the changing table. Once reached it, she begun to undress Alex. It was extremely humiliating: her mom didn’t saw her naked since she was younger. When the girl was completely nude, Theresa made her lay on the changing table, and took a package from the wardrobe.
When she had taken out the diaper, Alex saw that was more than big enough to fit her. It was an adult diaper… but with childish design: a lot of fishes that were swimming around the wetness indicator.
Theresa begun to accurately wipe her crotch and bottom with wet wipes, meanwhile making childish noises. Alex covered her face with her hands, in shame.
While Theresa was applying the baby oil, the door suddenly opened. And Alex wished with all of her heart to disappear into the ground and never come back.
“Mom? Have you finished changing Alex?” the person at the door asked.
It was…
155232221121121.title: Diapered by mom

choices: She felt the urge to pee
1552322211211211.content:
Justin entered in the nursery, making Alex feel ashamed like never before in her life. Her brother was there, looking at her while she was completely naked with her mom that was applying baby oil at her private parts.
“Just a minute, darling.” Theresa replied, beginning to inundate her daughter’s privates with baby powder “I’m almost finished.”
“Dad is waiting for you in the basement.” Justin said.
The mother slid a diaper under Alex’s butt, and taped it closed.
“I’m going. Please, keep an eye on your sister here.” Theresa said, washing her hands in a near sink “If she removes her diaper, call me immediately. I see what Jerry wants and I’ll be back.”
With these words, Theresa leaved the room, closing the door behind her and leaving Alex, completely naked apart a thick diaper around her waist, alone with her brother.
“Do you really have to look at me like that?” Alex asked, annoyed.
“Mom said to keep an eye on you.” Justin replied “She seems afraid that you could remove your diaper. I’m sure she doesn’t want to clean puddles on the floor.”
Justin never saw her naked since they were very very little. She couldn’t believe she was in a situation like that.
“Oh, please. I’m perfectly able to keep it.” Alex said, blushing a little.
“Oh, really?” her brother said in return, with a sarcastic tone “For how long? Ten minutes? Or do you have beaten your record and you can keep it for twenty minutes?”
“Oh, shut up egghead!” Alex blurted out.
Instead of taking offence, however, Justin laughed and patted her head, saying “Oh, my baby sister is so cute.”
The girl moved away is hand with a slap, sighing deeply in anger.
“What happens if I remove this thing?” she asked to her brother, pointing at her diaper.
“I will report it to mom, and she would give you a punishment.” Justin replied “And she seems already annoyed, so I imagine it would be the punishment of a lifetime.”
Blocked in a diaper with her brother looking at her. Great.
“Justin, can I borrow your wand?” she tried, wanting to leave that absurd reality.
Predictably, however, Justin laughed, saying “Oh, Alex. You know you can’t play with magic.”

Juliet, Justin’s vampire girlfriend, entered the door. She was wearing her usual clothes, apart from a visible padding under her skirt. It was so obvious that she must have worn the thickest diaper brand on sale.
“Hi.” she said, entering “Sorry to step in. I was looking for Justin.”
“Oh, my Shnoogly-boo-boo McCuteykins.” Justin greeted her, reaching her and giving her a hug “My padded adorable girl.”
Juliet giggled, and hugged him back. Then looked at Alex and Harper, greeting them too “Hi, girls. I catch from your outfits that you have been naughty.”
“Oh, they were very naughty.” Theresa replied in their place “They both removed their diapers without permission.”
“What naughty little girls.” Juliet commented “In my house they would have been severely spanked.”
“I was going to do that, but Justin suggested something else.” Theresa explained, telling Juliet everything that happened.
Alex wanted to disappear. Great! Been humiliated in front of mom, Justin and Harper was embarrassing enough. Juliet was the cherry on the cake.
But Alex’s humiliation was only at the beginning. While she was looking at Justin and Juliet, she felt her diaper getting warmer and heavier. Realizing she had wet herself, Alex blushed deeply.
Since both Theresa and Justin were looking at Juliet, it was the vampire herself that noticed Alex’s diaper wetness indicator changing color behind her transparent skirt.
“Mrs. Russo, I think Alex wetted herself.” she said, making Alex blush even more.
Theresa turned back to look at Alex and checked her diaper, seeing that it was wet indeed.
“See, Alex? This is the reason little girls must be always diapered.” Theresa said in a scolding tone “If I hadn't put you in your diaper on time, you would have peed all over the floor.”
Alex couldn’t believe she had just peed in a diaper, and in front of so many people. It was a bad sensation, the wetness around her crotch was really annoying, and made her hope for a change soon. She would never have believed that she would have wished for a fresh diaper.

Theresa entered in the nursery, holding the hand of a little girl Alex had never seen before. The girl was a real cutie, with long dark hair and a lovely face. Like Alex, she was naked apart for a diaper around her waist.
“Come on, Alex, jump off from the changing table.” Theresa said “Maxine need to be changed in a fresh diaper.”
“Maxine?!” Alex exclaimed, shocked “Oh my god! Is that little girl Max?”
“Yeah, I am.” Maxine replied, quite fiercely “Thanks to Justin now I look like this.”
“It’s only temporary, and it was an incident!” Justin defended himself.
“Yeah, and now I am stuck in diapers since I turn back to normal!” Maxine exclaimed “I don’t need them!”
“It seems to me that you are wearing a quite wet one.” Alex giggled, trying to find comfort in her brother discomfort.
“That is because now I am not allowed to go to the bathroom. Unlike you, I can keep it in!” was her reply.
Theresa gave Maxine a little pat on her bum, saying “I’m sorry, but the rules are the same for everyone. Until you go back to normal, you have to wear and use diapers.”
Alex came down from the changing table with a little jump, and while Theresa guided Maxine toward it she asked Justin “How did it happened?”
“It’s your memory falling down again?” Justin asked back, with a worried tone.
“Just a little.” lied his sister “Can you refresh it?”
Justin nodded, and explained “I had a fight with T.J. Taylor. That dumb excuse of a Wizard threatened to hurt you and I couldn’t stand that. I made him blue, but a stray spell hit Max and… turned him like this.”
Theresa made Maxine lay down on the changing table, and began to remove her wet diaper, then cleaning her with wet wipes. Maxine was visibly embarrassed, and Alex admitted herself that was quite entertaining to watch to. Not at the diaper change itself, that was quite disgusting for her taste, but to see Maxine in her same situation was amusing.
Once Maxine was clean, Theresa applied the baby oil and then the powder, before sliding a diaper under her bum and tapping it close.
“All done.” the mom said, and helped her up.
“So Justin is the only one with a wand, now?” Alex asked, already laughing at her new little sister.
“I have my wand in the Lair.” Maxine replied “Unlike you, I can use magic. Because despite this body, I’m a boy.”
Alex grinned. Max, in every form, was always easy to trick. She finally knew were to find a Wand.
With a rapid movement, Alex opened the nursery door.

Using all the speed her legs gave her despite her padding, Alex leaved the nursery and reached the Sub-Station. Luckily for her, the restaurant was empty. Maybe it was closing day? It didn’t matter, what did matter was to reach the Lair, to get Max’s wand and use it to leave that crazy reality.
Alex moved toward the freezer, which she opened and entered in the Lair.
Unfortunately, however, it wasn’t empty. Her father Jerry was waiting there.
“Alex, you’re first. I’m glad you’re taking it seriously.” he said, not giving care to the fact that his daughter was naked apart from the diaper.
“Hi dad.” she replied, quite embarrassed “I was looking for Max’s wand.”
“Alex, I know you’re eager to get a real wand, but you can’t use your brother’s.” Jerry said, stretching out his hand toward her and handing her a small wand “Here, take your training wand.”
“The training wand? Really?” Alex exclaimed “I’m not a little kid, dad!”
Jerry made a strange face, replying “Alex, it’s the wand you used till now. I know you want a personal wand, but not until you’re potty trained.”
“Dad!” she yelled, stomping her foot.
“Stop this tantrum, young lady, and take your training wand.” Jerry said in a firmer tone.
Defeated, Alex took the wand, sighing, making her dad smile.
“Like usual, it is charged with the spell of today’s lesson.” Jerry explained “Now let’s wait for your brothers. I mean, your brother and sister.”
Short after, Justin and Maxine (that was wearing a shirt and a pair of jeans that didn’t concealed her padding) came to the Lair to, followed by Theresa. The mother reached Alex and gave a loud spank over her diapered bottom, scolding her “I know you are eager to do attend the magic lesson, but you must not escape from me.”
“I’m sorry, mom.” the young wizard said, hoping to get her go away quicker this way. In fact, Theresa nodded satisfied and left the Lair.
Once alone with his kids, Jerry begun the lesson.
“Ok, today’s lesson is about a spell called the Thin Man Spell.” Jerry explained “It’s a useful spell that can turn tridimensional beings into two-dimensional ones. Justin, can you give us a demonstration, please?”
The older brother stood up, with his wand in his hand, waiting for instruction.
“It’s a spell that you can do even without your wand, but as usual it is much more difficult.” Jerry said “The spell to pronounce is Hair frizzy, don't have a tizzy, thin lizzy. Try using it on yourself.”
Justin nodded, and moving his wand toward his head he said “Hair frizzy, don't have a tizzy, thin lizzy.”
The magic flashed out from his wand, and when the flash was gone Justin was bidimensional.
“Cool.” Alex exclaimed, trying to find a bit of humor in that strange situation “Now his body reflect his character.”
Maxine laughed at that, but Justin quickly responded “I’m not the one wearing a diaper. Do you know that, right?”
Alex gave him a bad stare, as Jerry explained how to return normal. Following his father’s instruction, Justin tuned back to his tridimensional form.
“Ok, Alex, it’s your turn.” Jerry said, while Justin sat down again “Turn yourself two-dimensional using this spell.”
Alex stood up, with the training wand firmly held in her hand, and…

“Alex, are you alright?” Jerry asked her, worried.
Blushing, Alex replied “I need to go to the bathroom.”
Jerry sighed and relieve and then gave her a puzzled look, saying “You’re wearing it, remember? Use your diaper like usual and when you’ve done it all focus on the spell.”
No, it was too embarrassing. It wasn’t possible that her father was telling her to wet herself in the middle of the lesson. She hasn’t done that in ages!
“Please, can’t I just go the bathroom?” Alex asked, holding her belly, visibly in pain.
But her father shook his head, replying firmly “Until you’re not 18, you can’t begin potty training, and until you’re not potty trained the bathroom is off limits. You know the rules, young lady.”
Catching that continue to struggle in that way was completely useless, Alex sighed and relaxed her body, letting the pee come out and reach the welcoming diaper. The wetness spread around her crotch, as the diaper went warmer and heavier. It was a sensation that she didn’t like a single bit. And she felt really embarrassed.
